sentences: They started their violin training at the early age of nine and six respectively from Sangita Bhushanam Prof. T.S. Krishnaswami at the Shanmukhananda Sangeeta Vidyalaya, Mumbai.
Ranjani and Gayatri started their musical journey as violinists before they reached their teens, performing in sabhas (music organizations) around India and abroad.
The sisters have given vocal concerts since 1997, after they became students of Padma Bhushan Sangeeta Kala Acharya P. S. Narayanaswamy.
Bolava Vitthala – Abhang (Sant Tukaram) –  in Raga Bhatiyar.
Maajha ha Vitthal - Abhang ( Sant Janabai) in Raga Pilu
Received the title of Vani Kala Sudhakara from Thyaga Brahma Gana Sabha in 2015
Kalki Krishnamurthi Memorial Award in 2004 (instituted by the Kalki trust in memory of the writer Sri.
The Awakening (2000) - Ranjani–Gayatri's first vocal album
Kannan Thiruvadi ( Concert from Dec Music Season 2014)
Ka Shanmuka ( Video of a live concert from a live concert during Dec music season 2015)
Jaya Jayavanti ( Concert from Dec Music Season 2015)
